Author: SheDontCarrie
Text: Same, I am spending weeks at my boyfriend's house and I have to be so vigilant and secretly cut out calories to keep up my restriction. Dinner is the main meal we will eat together so I have to be strategic with calories.

Author: not_the_cicada
Text: I hate those situations.   A guy I like tried to buy me food and I just turned it down for coffee and looked like a psycho but HEY it was less stressful than eating in front of him :(  The kicker - he didn’t care for his and didn’t eat it and he’s so gorgeous and super thin AND now I’m alone and unsupervised for a few days so I can lose my damn mind in peace :(  Sorry for word vomiting that all in your thread, I just really relate and have no one irl I can talk to about this :(  Does your bf know you have an ED?
